rescuecore2.log

Interface LogRecord

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandsRecord, ConfigRecord, EndLogRecord, InitialConditionsRecord, PerceptionRecord, StartLogRecord, UpdatesRecord

    public interface LogRecord
    Interface for entries in the log.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecordType getRecordType()
      Get the type of this record.
      void read(java.io.InputStream in)
      Read this log record's data from a stream.
      void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Write this log record to a stream.

    • Method Detail

      • getRecordType

        RecordType getRecordType()
        Get the type of this record.
        Returns:
        The record type.

      • write

        void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Write this log record to a stream.
        Parameters:
        out - The OutputStream to write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem writing to the stream.

      • read

        void read(java.io.InputStream in)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 LogException
        Read this log record's data from a stream.
        Parameters:
        in - The InputStream to read from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading the stream.
        LogException - If there is a problem reading the log record.
